EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your registration: System Manager Training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your registration!
System Manager Training
An official quote from your TriTech representative will be sent and your registration will be completed once it is returned to us with all the proper signatures etc.
Training for advanced IMC TriTech users designated as primary/lead IMC Solution “guru” for department or agency.
Training Location: TriTech Software Systems 13 Centennial Drive North Grafton, MA 01536
Questions? Contact Coleen Storck 774-551-9100 | coleen.storck@tritech.com
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road | San Diego, CA 92121
